nodes.text: A Droid's Tale was a children's book released by Golden Books in November 1997, written by John Whitman. The book was part of Golden's "SmartPages" series, that played audio clips when a button was pushed and featured the voice of Anthony Daniels. The cover price was $22.95.

Young Star Wars fans will delight in this interactive tale of two of the most famous droids in the galaxy! Featuring the authentic voice of C-3PO and still photos from the movies, kids can read, press buttons, and listen as our favorite droid describes each and every page!
